pages.text: A grisly scepter born of malice and villager sacrifice. Judgment adds the modifiers $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/inner_fire)Inner Fire() and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/dangerous)Dangerous$(), and the unique spell $(l:amethyst_imbuement:spell_book/execute)Execute$(). Can be used like a weapon. $(br2)$(l)Mana:$() 1450
$(italic)Blood seeps from the end of the jagged curved blade without end, slowly dripping. Dripping. Dripping...$()
